item.title: ONET Visualization
item.description:
https://tinyurl.com/jobs-explorer

Learning objectives of this personal project is to:

  • Learn how to use Dash-Plotly framework for interactive analysis/visualization
  • Learn how to use dash-cytoscape package to generate network graphs
  • Learn how to deploy on to a cloud provider
  • Learn how to use Docker for deployment (in progress)

This is somewhat of an extension of a team project I did for CSE6242. Instead of using our own algorithm to recommend other similar occupations, I am using the recommendations from ONET database. Their methodology which can be found in this link, is definitely more comprehensive than the approach we took - taking into account the manhattan distance between skills composition. Also the data is presented as a network graph to encourage users to visually explore other neighbouring occupations.
